TopicTitle: Spacecraft spin when SAS turn off

Articles.Content:
Game Version: 1.8.1

The spacecraft will going on a pitch roll uncontrollably when I turn the SAS off both in the atmosphere and outer space, I tried alt+x but it does't work at all. Even I switched my game version to 1.7.3, the rotation still happen.

Sorry for my bad English grammar, but my native language is not English.

Here are logs: 

Outpot_log: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1VfUTWUHV7M3m22S8G7phzAwBDT5R9rAI/view?usp=sharing
Player.log: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1YBSVFVHQOzpEyOwTolXYsQMaQ05SuskB/view?usp=sharing
